attributes.action: take a finess test to see how fit he is and it is to be telivised live on tv to make sure he actualy dose it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
he makes children in school do fitness test it is about time he toke one. he is always going on a bout the nations fitness level he should set the example and take a fitness test 

it should be televised live on tv so that we can see how is performance is and hm setting the example to the nation

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
